title: Road to City Hall 5/2/17
author: Road
description: Watch the May 2, 2017 episode of the Road to City Hall, hosted by Errol Louis.
cleaned_text: On the May 2, 2017 episode of the Road to City Hall: - She made her name as a professional wrestling executive and now Linda McMahon is leading the Trump administration's efforts to help small businesses. She sat down with Errol Louis to discuss regulations, tax reform and more. - With City Correction Commissioner Joe Ponte facing calls to step down, Errol Louis spoke with union leader Elias Husamudeen. - Errol Louis discussed the Republican field in the Race for Mayor, and a scandal in the City's Correction Department, with former U.S. Senator Alfonse D'Amato and former Public Advocate Betsy Gotbaum. - Brooklyn District Attorney candidate Ama Dwimoh joined Errol Louis to discuss her past as a prosecutor and make the case for why she can emerge from a crowded field in the race for Brooklyn District Attorney.
